# KgFoundry MkDocs Suite

How AI agents should navigate this site.

## Overview

- [KgFoundry MkDocs Suite](https://example.invalid/docs/index.md): Top-level overview and entry points.

## Architecture

- [Architecture](https://example.invalid/docs/architecture/index.md): Architecture narratives and diagrams.

## Modules

- [Modules](https://example.invalid/docs/modules/index.md): Generated module reference powered by Griffe.

## API

- [Api](https://example.invalid/docs/api/index.md): HTTP API reference rendered with ReDoc.

## CLI

- [Cli](https://example.invalid/docs/cli/index.md): Interactive Typer command reference with live help output.
